profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit

did.head: Overview
did.abstract: Photographs of football players, coaches, and games, and team pictures for the 1924 varsity and frosh squads. Individuals include coaches Glenn S. Warner, Claude E. Thornhill, and Andrew Kerr, and players Murray W. Cuddeback, William C. Neill, Jr., George H. Baker, Frederick H. Swann, and George Bogue. The album also includes a few pictures of the 1924 yell leaders; basketball players and coaches; and three baseball players. The photographer is not identified, but the album is most likely the work of Berton Crandall or Richard Keeble, both of whom took extensive photographs of Stanford athletic events.

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: Department of Special Collections and University Archives

accessrestrict.head: Information about Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research.

userestrict.head: Ownership & Copyright
userestrict.p: All requests to reproduce, publish, quote from, or otherwise use collection materials must be submitted in writing to the Head of Special Collections and University Archives, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, California 94304-6064. Consent is given on behalf of Special Collections as the owner of the physical items and is not intended to include or imply permission from the copyright owner. Such permission must be obtained from the copyright owner, heir(s) or assigns. See: http://library.stanford.edu/depts/spc/pubserv/permissions.html.
Restrictions also apply to digital representations of the original materials. Use of digital files is restricted to research and educational purposes.

prefercite.head: Cite As
prefercite.p: Stanford University football photograph album (A0089). Department of Special Collections and University Archives, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, Calif.

scopecontent.head: Description of the Collection
scopecontent.p: Photographs of football players, coaches, and games, and team pictures for the 1924 varsity and frosh squads. Individuals include coaches Glenn S. Warner, Claude E. Thornhill, and Andrew Kerr, and players Murray W. Cuddeback, William C. Neill, Jr., George H. Baker, Frederick H. Swann, and George Bogue. The album also includes a few pictures of the 1924 yell leaders; basketball players and coaches; and three baseball players. The photographer is not identified, but the album is most likely the work of Berton Crandall or Richard Keeble, both of whom took extensive photographs of Stanford athletic events.
